definition: A professional who works at a border or customs checkpoint, responsible for inspecting and regulating the movement of goods and people across the border. They typically enforce customs and immigration laws, ensuring compliance and collecting duties or taxes on imported or exported items.

examples.english: The customs officer inspects the goods at the airport.

examples.german: Der Zollbeamte arbeitet an der Grenze.
examples.english: The customs officer works at the border.
